title: BugSplat
body: Ever since I updated to patch 6.15. I can't join games. I'm always disconnected when the game is about to go to the loading screen. I need help. Can anyone tell me what is happening?

replies.body:
Bugsplats are often the result of Driver or installation issues with League. Although there are many potential reasons why your client may be bugsplatting, our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) will address the most frequent fixes.

Let me know if you continue to see bugsplats after working through that guide.
